item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, July 5, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer hails historic Labour victory as Conservatives sink to worst-ever result
2. [Opinion] Starmer stands supreme but he cannot ignore the Reform surge
3. [Opinion] How much cash would it take for you to quit your job?
4. Which high-profile MPs have lost their seats?
5. Biden says he ‘screwed up’ in debate as he fights to save candidacy
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, July 5, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
